Text: O, me̩ ki kʼeli etito̩ ñw Jihofa,
Jihofa je̩ ñw one̩ fʼujadu-wñ ma me̩,
I rewa ufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ kpai ubi one̩ kʼi ache
Me̩ fʼogu uyo̩ kpa taa ñw Jihofa, abo ane̩ ile̩ du;
Me̩ ki nʼo̩kakachi kpai omu o̩kakachi kekele
Ohimini abadi ki kwa ke, kpai e̩wñ ki jʼefu-wñ e̩ko̩;
o̩gba Jihofa, todu i awa kʼi kajo̩ ane̩ ile̩-i.
